quota_attainment.label: quota_attainment

prediction_forecast.query: opp = load "${App.Datasets.forecast31_tp.FullyQualifiedName}";opp = filter opp by 'ForecastCategoryName' == "Closed"; opp = filter opp by date('Period_StartDate_Year', 'Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day') in [.."current day"]; k = group opp by all; k = foreach k generate "1970" as 'Date_Year', "01" as 'Date_Month', "01" as 'Date_Day'; k = group k by ('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day'); k = foreach k generate 'Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day', count() as 'sum'; k = fill k by (dateCols=('Date_Year','Date_Month','Date_Day', "Y-M-D")); k = timeseries k generate 'sum' as 'cnt' with (length=25000,  dateCols=('Date_Year','Date_Month','Date_Day', "Y-M-D")); k = filter k by {{row(CloseDate_1.selection, [0], ["min", "max"]).asDateRange("date('Date_Year','Date_Month', 'Date_Day')")}}; k = filter k by date('Date_Year','Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in [.."current day"]; k = group k by all; k1 = foreach k generate first('Date_Year') as 'Period_StartDate_Year', first('Date_Month') as 'Period_StartDate_Month', first('Date_Day') as 'Period_StartDate_Day'; k2 = foreach k generate last('Date_Year') as 'Period_StartDate_Year', last('Date_Month') as 'Period_StartDate_Month', last('Date_Day') as 'Period_StartDate_Day'; k3 = union k1,k2; a = group opp by ('Period_StartDate_Year', 'Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day'); a = foreach a generate 'Period_StartDate_Year', 'Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day', sum(a.'ForecastAmount') as 'A'; c = union a,k3; c = foreach c generate 'Period_StartDate_Year', 'Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day', 'A'; c = fill c by (dateCols=('Period_StartDate_Year','Period_StartDate_Month','Period_StartDate_Day', "Y-M-D")); c = group c by ('Period_StartDate_Year', 'Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day'); c = foreach c generate c.'Period_StartDate_Year' + "~~~" + c.'Period_StartDate_Month' + "~~~" + c.'Period_StartDate_Day' as 'Period_StartDate_Year~~~Period_StartDate_Month~~~Period_StartDate_Day', first(A) as 'A', 'Period_StartDate_Year', 'Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day'; c = group c by ('Period_StartDate_Year~~~Period_StartDate_Month~~~Period_StartDate_Day'); c = foreach c generate 'Period_StartDate_Year~~~Period_StartDate_Month~~~Period_StartDate_Day', first(A) as 'A', first('Period_StartDate_Year') as 'Period_StartDate_Year', first('Period_StartDate_Month') as 'Period_StartDate_Month', first('Period_StartDate_Day') as 'Period_StartDate_Day', sum(sum(A)) over ([..0] partition by all order by ('Period_StartDate_Year~~~Period_StartDate_Month~~~Period_StartDate_Day')) as 'sum_Amount'; c = timeseries c generate 'sum_Amount' as 'estimate' with (length=100, predictionInterval=95, ignoreLast=false, dateCols=('Period_StartDate_Year','Period_StartDate_Month','Period_StartDate_Day', "Y-M-D")); c = foreach c generate 'Period_StartDate_Year', 'Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day', 'Period_StartDate_Year' + "~~~" + 'Period_StartDate_Month' + "~~~" + 'Period_StartDate_Day' as 'Period_StartDate_Year~~~Period_StartDate_Month~~~Period_StartDate_Day', A, sum_Amount, estimate, estimate_high_95, estimate_low_95; c = filter c by {{row(CloseDate_1.selection, [0], ["min", "max"]).asDateRange("date('Period_StartDate_Year','Period_StartDate_Month', 'Period_StartDate_Day')")}}; c = group c by all; c = foreach c generate last('estimate') as 'sum_prediction',  last('estimate_high_95') as 'upper_bound', last('estimate_low_95') as 'lower_bound';

TimeStamp.label: TimeStamp

gap_to_goal.label: gap_to_goal

prediction_1.label: prediction

chart_open_opptys_activities.label: chart_open_opptys_activities
